author: zizi3988
content:
Hello, I'm interested in fuzz testing the EVM and I'm looking to contribute to the enhancement of existing tooling. Could anyone provide insights on the current state of fuzzers, their limitations, and areas that need improvement? I've checked the open issues particularly on https://github.com/holiman/goevmlab and https://github.com/MariusVanDerWijden/FuzzyVM, but there are not many. <@211091239112671234> <@360491619402776577> 
For example, in the govmlab, I noticed that there isn't a setup to test the reth EVM.
